techmeme.title: Stability AI CEO Prem Akkaraju, who was hired in June 2024, says the startup has seen "triple digit growth" and has "a clean balance sheet, no debt" (Kali Hays/Fortune)
How WhatsApp has evolved from a messaging app into a comprehensive business platform, aggressively luring businesses to its suite of paid messaging products (Issie Lapowsky/Rest of World)

Norwegian payment service Vipps launches the world's first alternative to Apple Pay on iPhone, following Apple's move to open up NFC access to devs in iOS 18.1 (Tim Hardwick/MacRumors)
Oracle reports Q2 revenue up 9% YoY to $14.06B, vs. $14.1B est., says it made a deal with Meta for training Llama models on its cloud; ORCL down 6%+ after hours (Jonathan Vanian/CNBC)
